ftbquests.chapter.progression.title: Progression[--进度--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.subtitle: Onward and Upward![--继续前进!--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests0.de: The &bEye of Legend&r will &6help you find Sky Villages&r![--&b传说之眼&r会&6帮助你找到天空村庄&r!--]

[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"][--[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests0.ta: Visit a Sky Village[--造访天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests1.su: First thing's first[--第一件事情是第一件--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests1.de: Naturally, the first step of progression is getting resources.[--自然,进程的第一步就是获得资源。--]
A &bSifter&r and &bMesh&r will allow you to get infinite resources from blocks like Sand and Gravel.[--&b筛子&r和&b筛子&r可以让你从沙子和砂砾这样的方块中获得无限的资源.--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests2.su: Mesh with greatness[--高强合金筛网--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests2.de: &bBetter Meshes&r are integral to progression, as they unlock many necessary materials.[--&b Better Meshes&r是进度的一个组成部分,因为它们解锁了许多必要的材料.--]
Every higher tier can get everything that the previous tiers could, so there's no reason to keep old ones around.[--每一级都可以得到上一级可能得到的所有东西,所以不需要保留旧的了。--]

[\"\",\"For more information on these Meshes, see the \",{\"text\":\"Ex Nihil\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"765CE56E943A0E79\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Ex Nihil chapter\"]}},\" chapter.\"][--[\"\",\"For more information on these Meshes, see the \",{\"text\":\"Ex Nihil\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"765CE56E943A0E79\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Ex Nihil chapter\"]}},\" chapter.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests3.de: Upon entering the Nether, the Eye of Legend will automatically transform into the &bNether Eye of Legend&r![--进入下界时,传说之眼将自动转化为&b下界传说之眼&r!--]
It will point you in the direction of &6Nether Sky Islands&r, full of Pigmen to barter with![--它会告诉你&6下界空岛&r的方向,充满可以交易的猪人!--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests3.ta: Visit a Nether Sky Village[--造访下界天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests4.de: The next step is to &breach the End&r![--下一阶段是&b破坏末地&r!--]
There are two methods to do this:[--有两种方法可以做这个:--]
• &6Craft End Portal Frames&r, which is gated behind the Gaia Guardian.[--•&6工艺末地传送门框架&r,它被盖亚守护者挡住了.--]

[\"\",\"• Fly there using \",{\"text\":\"Ad Astra\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},\". See its chapter \",{\"text\":\"here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"22AD1FAD303703DE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"To the Stars chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"][--[\"\",\"• Fly there using \",{\"text\":\"Ad Astra\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},\". See its chapter \",{\"text\":\"here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"22AD1FAD303703DE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"To the Stars chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.su: Three headed monstrosity[--三个怪物头颅--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.de: Once you've made it to the End, &bfight and defeat the Trigon&r, which has replaced the Ender Dragon![--一旦你到了末地,&b战斗并击败三头龙&r,它已经替换了末影龙!--]
After this, you're free to &6play how you choose&r! Everything is open to you now.[--在这之后,你可以自由&6播放你选择的方式&r!现在一切都为你打开了.--]

[\"\",\"If you want a more extreme challenge, check out the \",{\"text\":\"Overpowered!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"2166DD3F75BEF301\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Overpowered! chapter\"]}},\" questline. Otherwise, enjoy exploring all the mods in your palace in the sky!\"][--[\"\",\"If you want a more extreme challenge, check out the \",{\"text\":\"Overpowered!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"2166DD3F75BEF301\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Overpowered! chapter\"]}},\" questline. Otherwise, enjoy exploring all the mods in your palace in the sky!\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.ta: Kill the Ender Dragon, Trigon[--杀死末影龙,三头龙--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests6.de: Certain tasks don't just need you to &ohave&r something, you have to &6submit it&r.[--某些任务并不只需要你&o有&r的东西,你必须&6提交它&r.--]
For items, that's easy. Just have it in your inventory and click the task. For fluids and energy, you have to use &bTask Screens&r.[--对于物品,这很简单。只需在你的物品栏中单击任务。对于流体和能量,你必须使用&b任务屏幕&r.--]

Place the Task Screen, and &6set the Task&r in the GUI. From there, you can &6pipe what's needed into the Task Screen&r to progress the task.[--放置任务屏幕,然后&6在GUI中设置任务&r。从那里,你可以&6将任务需要的东西放入任务屏幕&r来推进任务。--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests7.de: There are many ways to generate FE in &dFTB Skies&r. Feel free to explore the various tech mods at your preference.[--在&dFTB Skies&r中有多种方式产生FE。按您的喜好任意探索各种科技模组。--]
For a simple method, &6Wind Generators&r or the various forms of &6coal-using Generators&r are best early game.[--对于简单的方法,&6风力发电机&r或各种&6煤炭发电机&r是最好的早期游戏.--]
